name: Morrigan
title: The Succubus Queen
subtitle: A seductive demon who uses charm and dark magic to control the battlefield
lore: As a powerful succubus, Morrigan combines alluring charm with deadly magical abilities. Her mastery over dark arts and ability to manipulate enemies makes her a formidable presence on the battlefield. While her playful nature might deceive some, her true power lies in her ability to turn the tides of battle through careful positioning and tactical use of her abilities.

passive.name: Succubus Wrath
passive.description: Morrigan has [14%] Spellvamp from the beginning of the game.

Q.name: Hate Spike
Q.description: Morrigan summons a spike at the cursor's location on the ground. If it hits an enemy, it deals [70/125/250/385/485] damage and slows them by [30%] for 3s. If Morrigan hits the same enemy again within 5s, it deals [180%] of the ability's base damage, until 5s pass or Morrigan doesn't hit the target again.

W.name: Sharp Shield
W.description: Morrigan places a thorny shield on herself, which explodes after 2s or if Morrigan is auto-attacked by an enemy. The shield can be canceled by Morrigan (up to 2s). When the shield is destroyed, all nearby enemies take [80/150/350/500/600] damage and block one basic attack.

E.name: Bat Dash
E.description: Morrigan dashes in the targeted direction. If Morrigan passes through an enemy during the ability, it charms them for 0.8s.

R.name: Spike Garden
R.description: Morrigan charms all enemies around her for 1s and deals [675/1000/1100] damage to them. Already charmed enemies take [50%] more damage.

1.name: Enhanced Spike
1.description: Morrigan's Q ability slows for an additional [10%] and lasts for [3s] instead of 2s.

1.name: Ethereal Dash
1.description: After using the Bat Dash ability, Morrigan becomes untargetable for [0.65] second, during which she cannot be targeted by abilities.

1.name: Defensive Magic
1.description: Morrigan gains 5% damage reduction for [2s] if she hits an ability. This can goes up to 15%.

5.name: Enhanced Shield
5.description: Morrigan's Sharp Shield now blocks 50% of the damage she would receive first from a spell and it still blocks an autoattack.

5.name: Tank Build
5.description: Morrigan's maximum health increases by 22%, but all her abilities deal only 60% damage.

5.name: Extended Range
5.description: Morrigan's abilities have slightly increased range.

10.name: Extended Charm
10.description: The charm duration of Morrigan's R ability increases from 1s to [1.5s].

10.name: Quick Dash
10.description: If Bat Dash was used within 2s before using the R ability, Bat Dash's cooldown resets to 0.

15.name: Magic Pierce
15.description: Morrigan ignores half of the enemy's magic resistance with her first spell hit (20 seconds cd/target).

15.name: Teleport Quest
15.description: QUEST: Do not die until level 15 -> Morrigan receives an activatable item that allows her to teleport to any point on the map (60s cooldown).

15.name: Silencing Spike
15.description: Double Q hit silences the enemy for [0.5s].

20.name: Charm Amplification
20.description: Enemies charmed by Morrigan take 20% more damage.

20.name: Desperate Flight
20.description: Morrigan gains 50% bonus movement speed if she is below 40% HP for [3s].

20.name: Ultimate Succubus
20.description: Ultimate Succubus form: All of Morrigan's abilities deal 15% more damage, but her Spellvamp is reduced to 5%.

strengths: Strong crowd control with charm effects
weaknesses: Vulnerable when abilities are on cooldown
